author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

This fixes the Phase 2 ECAL digis gain id bit mask by setting it to use one bit instead of two.
In addition, ADC and gain id masks for the Phase 1 MGPA sample are introduced similar to the existing Phase 2 ones and the constants are documented. No output changes are expected.

#### PR validation:

Passes limited matrix tests.
title: Fix Phase 2 ECAL digis gain id bit mask
